articles.title: ET Rocks Out with Lifehouse
articles.description: <p>ET has the details...<a href="http://www.etonline.com/news/2008/12/68861/index.html"></a>ET's with the rock band Lifehouse, who along with Heineken, gave 60 college grad students the chance to shoot the video for their single "Make Me Over." </p><p>Heineken provided grants to USC’s School of Cinematic Arts graduate students to create music videos for two bands: One...
articles.author: RSS - Music

articles.title: Aerosmith frontman performs with Trans-Siberian Orchestra in New York, New Jersey
articles.description: Commented Trans Siberian Orchestra guitarist Chris Caffery ( also of Savatage ) : [ Playing with Steven Tyler at the Nassau Coliseum and Izod Arena ] was extra special for a ton of reasons. Headlining our fifth show there and having Steven Tyler as a special guest was so incredible! Fan filmed video footage of Tyler's December 12, 2008 performance with the Trans Siberian Orchestra at the Nassau Veterans Memorial Coliseum in Uniondale, New York can be viewed below.
articles.author: Metalrage.com Frontpage News

articles.title: Anberlin - New Surrender
articles.description: Anberlin have released many albums over the past six years according to their official page, this is however the first I have heard of them. The power and dominance these songs have are remarkable. In the coming year Anberlin are going to be making a large impact on the music industry.
articles.author: RoomThirteen.com CD Reviews

articles.title: Switchfoot launches “This is Home” video contest
articles.description: Switchfoot has launched a video contest asking fans to create a music video for the track “ This Is Home. ” Now Switchfoot wants to see what “ This Is Home ” means to you! Letter From Switchfoot : Thank you for all the great comments so far on the new video for “ This is Home ”.
articles.author: Hip Online

articles.title: The Afters 12 Days of Christmas Tour
articles.description: The AftersTHE AFTERS RING IN HOLIDAY SEASON WITH 12 DAYS OF CHRISTMAS TOUR “ Keeping Me Alive ” Used In Promotion for FOX’s “ The Secret Millionaire ” “ Keeping Me Alive ” is off of The Afters’ sophomore project Never Going Back to Ok Songs from “ Never Going Back to Ok ” were also used on the Rachael Ray show and Grey’s Anatomy as well as on Dr Phil.
articles.author: The M Collective

articles.title: Kutless Is All Games With Rock Band2, Contest And Tour
articles.description: Kutless is honored as the headlining act on the premiere fall tour. For more information on Kutless, their touring and more check out www. kutless. com Kutless’ music also has been featured in television and film.
articles.author: OvertureMedia

articles.title: MxPx (Leeds Festival 2008)
articles.description: MXPX are another of those American melodic punk bands that have been around for years and years and yet have never quite broken into the mainstream in the UK. Songs like ‘ Party, My House, Be There ’ exemplify what MXPX are all about, it’s lightweight, safe and friendly punk and that’s about it. You really can’t dislike MXPX, they have their moments and they are entertaining to watch but the material isn’t outstanding and there are several other bands on this stage today that blow them away.
articles.author: RoomThirteen.com Live Reviews

articles.title: The North Pole Project
articles.description: Ladies and gentlemen, I introduce you to the possible best album of the year, The North Pole Project, the junior release from Number One Gun.
articles.author: Sean Collins

articles.title: Expect The Impossible
articles.description: Calling all Christian artists; whether your style is contemporary Christian music, gospel music, praise and worship, inspirational, holy hip hop, reggae, or Christian rock, we want to feature you. Our Christian youth magazine has a strong Christian music magazine influence and we want to showcase emergingor established Christian artists.
